system.description: This spell functions like interposing hand, except that the forceful hand pursues and pushes away the opponent you designate. Treat this as a bull rush with a +14 bonus on the Strength check. The hand always moves with the opponent to push the target back the full distance and has no speed limit. Directing the spell to a new target is a move action. An opponent could push the hand up against you by successfully bull rushing it.

components.materialDescription: A sturdy glove made of leather or heavy cloth (focus).
